name: Medium Armor Pack
detailed_description:
Enjoy the simulation of authentic medium tanks from 1940



No subscription is required to purchase or play this content. This is a one time purchase pack.

Unleash Medium Tanks for WWII Online! These tanks are mobile and very capable in the early war. You can crew them with your friends and support infantry by taking out armored cars, light tanks, medium tanks and much more.

Here's what you unlock:

  • German Panzer III F
  • British A-13 Cruiser
  • French Hotchkiss 39

Upon purchase vehicles will be immediately available for you to access, providing supply is available in the brigade you've currently selected.

short_description: Gain a competitive edge against all light tanks, armored cars and more! Join the Armor brigade and receive the Panzer III F, A-13 Cruiser and Hotchkiss 39. Crew a tank with your friend!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
